info.title: Auto-generated OAS of Proxy-Print using OOPS

parameters.id:
long id -> a path parameter named id, of type long.
  - @RequestBody RingTableItem rti -> a body parameter representing the RingTableItem payload sent in the request body. RingTableItem has fields: ringType (String), infLim (int), supLim (int), price (String).
- In Swagger 2.0, endpoint parameters are defined under paths.[endpoint].[method].parameters. For this endpoint, we need:
  - A path parameter for id: in =
parameters.ringType:
string
    - infLim: integer
    - supLim: integer
    - price: string
  - The body schema should also indicate which fields are required; inferred from the code usage
parameters.name: id
body
parameters.description: Admin object to register. Contains user fields and admin-specific fields.

roles.description: Set of role names assigned to the user.

integerPart.description: Integer part of the monetary amount.

fractionalPart.description: Fractional part (cents) of the monetary amount.

parameters.name: printRequest
parameters.description: JSON payload containing the print request data

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Uploaded PDF file to be printed
